mapper.select: SELECT id, user1_id, user2_id, user1_online, user2_online, user1_unread, user2_unread, latest_content_type, latest_content, create_time FROM second_hand.connection WHERE (user1_id = #{user1Id} AND user2_id = #{user2Id}) OR (user1_id = #{user2Id} AND user2_id = #{user1Id})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO second_hand.connection(user1_id, user2_id, user1_online, user2_online, user1_unread, user2_unread, latest_content_type, latest_content, create_time) VALUES (#{user1Id}, #{user2Id}, #{user1Online}, #{user2Online}, #{user1Unread}, #{user2Unread}, #{latestContentType}, #{latestContent}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT u.id as id, u.username as targetname, u.user_img as targetimg, connect.user2_online as user2_online, connect.user1_unread as user1_unread, connect.latest_content_type as latest_content_type, connect.latest_content as latest_content FROM second_hand.connection as connect, second_hand.user as u WHERE (connect.user1_id = u.id AND u.id = #{userId})
